mapper.insert: INSERT INTO onbid_history (item_id, cltr_hstr_no, cltr_no, pbct_begn_dtm, pbct_cls_dtm, open_price, cltr_stts_nm) SELECT i.id, i.cltr_hstr_no, i.cltr_no, i.pbct_begn_dtm, i.pbct_cls_dtm, i.min_bid_prc, i.pbct_cltr_stat_nm FROM onbid_item i WHERE i.id = #{itemId} AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM onbid_history h WHERE h.item_id = i.id AND h.cltr_hstr_no = i.cltr_hstr_no )
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT TRIM( REGEXP_REPLACE( REGEXP_REPLACE(ldnm_adrs, '\\[.*?\\]', ''), '\\(.*?\\)', '' ) )) FROM onbid_item WHERE ldnm_adrs IS NOT NULL AND ldnm_adrs != ''
AND ldnm_adrs LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%')

SELECT h.cltr_hstr_no AS cltrHstrNo, h.cltr_no AS cltrNo, h.pbct_begn_dtm AS pbctBegnDtm, h.pbct_cls_dtm AS pbctClsDtm, h.open_price AS openPrice, h.cltr_stts_nm AS cltrSttsNm FROM onbid_history h JOIN onbid_item i ON i.id = h.item_id WHERE TRIM( REGEXP_REPLACE( REGEXP_REPLACE(i.ldnm_adrs, '\\[.*?\\]', ''), '\\(.*?\\)', '' ) ) = #{address} ORDER BY h.pbct_begn_dtm DESC, h.id DESC
